description.value:
Prerequisite(s): Two Brutal Crocodile Maneuvers
Range: Melee
Target: Creature you are grappling
Duration: Instant

Description

Discipline: Brutal Crocodile (Strike) Letting loose with your unbridled feral fury, you plunge your armaments repeatedly into the hapless being in your coils. Make a full attack against a creature you are grappling. You may use all of your hands' worth of weapons for the purpose of this full attack if those hands would otherwise be used to grapple the creature under attack. This does not allow you to use weapons that you could not otherwise use while grappling.
